item.title: Leveraging Istio to Reduce Engineering Effort for API testing
item.description: Microservices applications rely on complex interactions among services. Engineering teams must create API tests with API mocks to shift testing left. Current approaches to mock creation are manual, which is expensive and inefficient. We illustrate how Istio can be leveraged to significantly reduce engineering effort necessary for API testing. API tests can be built using the following Istio capabilities: Dynamic deployment of Envoy filters to capture relevant examples of API requests and responses.
